ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: CANCAP-III, Sta. 3.059: SE of Madeira; 32°42'N 16°44'W; depth 108 m, sand; van Veen grab; 20.x.1978
CANCAP-VI, Sta. 6.088: Cape Verde Islands, SW of Sao Nicolau; 16°34'N 24°23'W; depth 460-540 m, fossil corals and red algae, reef; rectangular dredge; 14.vi.1982
HH.8804p: Spain, prov. Cádiz, Torre de la Peña, (± 10 km N of Tarifa); beach collected shell-grit; iv.1988
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.D01: Canary Islands, S coast of Lanzarote, W of Punta Papagayo; 28°50'N 13°47'W; scuba diving and shore collecting in sheltered bay, 15 m; 14,19.v.1980
CANCAP-I, Sta. 1.K16: SE coast of Madeira, Ponta de Sao Lourenço, W of Prainha; 32°44'N 16°44'W; rocky shore with tide pools;; 29-II/3.iii.1976
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.110: Canary Islands, S of Palma; 28°27'N 17°51'W; depth 110-180 m, gravel; van Veen grab; 28.v.1980

ncrsdatagroup.abcd:ProjectTitle: Collecting trip to the Azores in 1979

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: AZO.020: Azores, Sao Miguel, S coast, Ilhéu de Vila Franca; 37°42'N 25°27'W; sandy bottom with stones, depth about 4 m; shore-collecting and snorkeling; 28.ix.1979
Sta. MAU.125: Mauritania, off Banc d'Arguin; 20°25'N 17°26'W; depth 47 m, sandy bottom with some shell- and calcareous gravel; 3.5 m Agassiz trawl; 19.vi.1988
